articles.title: Michael van Gerwen: Three-time world champion suffers shock defeat by Irish amateur Michael Flynn in Players Championship

articles.description: Olympic shooter Manu Bhaker is named BBC Indian Sportswoman of the Year for 2024 after a global public vote.
